mapper.insert: insert into examinationapplication (eIName, eISpecification, eIFee, eIFeeType, eICode, rId) values (#{eIName}, #{eISpecification}, #{eIFee}, #{eIFeeType}, #{eICode}, #{rId})
mapper.select: select eAId, eIName, eISpecification, eIFee, eIFeeType, eICode ,rId from examinationapplication where eAId = #{eAId}
